title: Mind-Blowing NFL Trades + FA Fantasy Fallout - Fantasy Football Podcast for 3/22
description:
The Fantasy Footballers are back with an exciting new episode! On today’s fantasy football podcast, BIG news including Davante Adams to the Raiders, Deshaun Watson to the Browns, and Matt Ryan to the Colts! Andy, Mike, and Jason break down the fantasy football implications to the big trades, plus a handful of free agent signings. Manage your redraft, keeper, and dynasty fantasy football teams with the #1 fantasy football podcast. -- Fantasy Football Podcast for March 22nd, 2022.

The 2022 UDK is available for pre-order at UltimateDraftKit.com -- Get instant access to the Dynasty Pass with the UDK+

(04:50) - NFL News
(05:00) - Davante Adams to the Raiders
(13:35) - Deshaun Watson to the Browns
(20:25) - Baker Mayfield
(22:20) - Matt Ryan to the Colts
(24:30) - Marcus Mariota
(26:30) - D.J. Moore
(26:40) - Matthew Stafford
(27:20) - Free Agency Updates
(27:30) - Rams: Allen Robinson
(32:50) - Chiefs: JuJu Smith-Schuster
(38:15) - Titans: Robert Woods / Austin Hooper
(39:50) - Saints: Jameis Winston
(41:35) - Seahawks: Rashaad Penny
(44:50) - Falcons: Cordarrelle Patterson
